mapper.select: select a.type from tpg_user user left join tpg_user_role_relation urrel on user.id = urrel.user_id left join tpg_role r on urrel.role_id = r.id left join tpg_role_authority_relation rarel on r.id = rarel.role_id left join tpg_authority a on rarel.authority_id = a.id where user.id = #{id} and r.status = 1 and a.status = 1
